alert.note: Alert for Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern New Hanover, southwestern Pender and northeastern Brunswick Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rocky Point to Riegelwood. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Hampstead, Wrightsboro, Wilmington International Airport, Batarora, Rocky Point, Murrayville, Castle Hayne, Phoenix, Kings Grant, Porters Neck, Ogden, Belville, Navassa, Sandy Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 408 and 416. Interstate 140 between mile markers 15 and 20. US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 41 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
